item.title: Comey's indictment marks a dramatic escalation in Trump's political retribution efforts
item.description: Former FBI Director James Comey has been indicted after a push by President Trump. The move marks a dramatic escalation in Trump's effort to go after his political opponents.

item.title: Southeast U.S. braces for heavy rains from a potential tropical storm
item.description: The National Hurricane Center said a tropical depression currently hovering over the Caribbean could intensify as it approaches the East Coast. South Carolina's governor declared a state of emergency.

item.title: FBI agents fired, including some shown kneeling during 2020 protests
item.description: Agents said the kneeling was an act of deescalation. The Bureau investigated them at the time and found no causes for discipline. The FBI Agents Association decries the lack of due process.
